name: marathon.basics
description:
This package contains 3 assemblies.
 1. Marathon Controller: Implementation of a Physics-based controller for the Marathon Project 
 2.Marathon Muscles: Muscles, and in particular modular muscles, that work iwth both PhysX and Mujoco. 
 3.Marathon Ragdoll: Assets common to all the Ragdolls, including those in the main folder Marathon Environments.
